entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 04 February 2023
